name: Hydoor
text:
—Tch, damn it!!
Let go of me, you bastards!!
I'm not gonna get caught in a place like this!!

name: Isaribi
text:
Like hell I will, you idiot!
It was your bad luck to target this Estevolta, you pirates!

name: Isaribi
text:
Robbing and plundering as you please in every fleet city!
You've done this many evil deeds;
there’s no way you’re getting away with it!

name: Hydoor
text:
Then... then what about you guys!? You're invaders,
and you're imposing your own rules!!

name: Hydoor
text:
How much have you taken from us!? If you're so mighty,
give it all back right now, you parasites!!

name: Isaribi
text:
...!?
What are you talking about?
Invaders...!?!

—Has it been six years already since then?
Looking back now, I feel embarrassed by my youthful indiscretions.

But back then, I simply hated the new residents living in the sea;
I couldn't help but despise them. I deluded myself into thinking that was my driving force.

The largest island on Muirauka IV, where less than 10% of the land is dry.
The 'land' where the fleet nations have signed a non-aggression treaty. That's my hometown.

Once, we were at the top of the creatures on this planet,
but we were shamelessly deprived of our home by outsiders who came from other stars—

Our land was ravaged, our seas polluted, caught up in arbitrary conflicts...
As a result, we lost everything,
the pitiful minority known as the 'People of the Sea'.

I was born as the last generation of those who stubbornly clung to life,
confined to a tiny island, with only a countable few remaining.

name: Elder
text:
—Hydoor.
I warned you before.
Not to defy the new residents.

name: Elder
text:
This planet is no longer ours.
...We are beings
who are allowed to live by them.

name: Elder
text:
This land is our final abode, granted to us.
Here, we shall surrender ourselves to the laws of nature,
and live with nature until our last moment.

name: Elder
text:
So... please, by no means do anything that would threaten this land.
You must not provoke them.

I hated the atmosphere that hung over this small settlement.
Everyone, with their magnificent horns and fangs,
were just for show, all cowards.

They kept repeating, 'It's the law of nature,' 'It can't be helped,'
and they wore grim faces day and night.
Perhaps I was the only strange one.

But beyond the sea, where they were afraid to go,
the new residents living on the ships
were all full of vitality and smiles...

I couldn't help but compare them.
It was frustrating, and pathetic...
And gradually, I grew indignant.

name: Hydoor
text:
I'll make them realize...
the true terror of the 'People of the Sea' they cornered...!
At 13, I left the 'land' with such big talk. But, a naive kid couldn't survive alone...

As a result, I was picked up by a commune of stray outcasts from the fleet city,
and I became a member of the pirates who raided the fleet city.

I used various weapons I'd never held before,
threatening and taking things. Back at the base, we'd make a ruckus.
My initial grand ambitions were completely forgotten.

Looking back now, it was utterly childish...
But. At that time, I felt the freest
and happiest I had ever been in my life.

name: Pirate Boss
text:
—Listen up. Next, we're finally going after the biggest prey on this planet.
But that place is a den of heroes.

name: Pirate Boss
text:
We'll ambush a peripheral supply ship, take what we can, and get out of there quickly.
It's a race against time, so don't screw up, got it.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hah. Are you scared, boss?
Every ship we've been on has been full of weaklings
who are complacent from peace, haven't they?

name: Hydoor
text:
We're not the kind of guys to be easily caught by such wimpy folks.
Right?

name: Pirate Boss
text:
Heh, listen to the kid run his mouth.
But... yeah. Your swordplay has gotten
somewhat decent too—

name: Pirate Boss
text:
We gotta keep our spirits high,
or the name of pirates will fall into disrepute!
...Alright, let's do it!!

name: Pirate Boss
text:
We're going to establish the legend of the Muirauka IV pirate world:
'Successfully ambushing Estevolta'!
Let's go!!

name: Pirates
text: Ooh!!

...There's no need to talk about what happened next.
We were all easily captured by those damn fishermen
and ended up in a cage together.

The sentence imposed on us, who were wanted criminals,
was quite severe. Some of them ended up
spending an unimaginable amount of time in prison.

But only my sentence was significantly reduced
due to some minority protection law. Afterwards,
the monster incident that occurred was suppressed,
and even that became ambiguous.

Even that commutation felt like pity,
and I didn't like it... But still.
While I was in the cage, I thought about a lot of things.

As a result, I came to know the true nature of what I really hated.
Of course, it was true that I hated the new residents...

But more than that... I realized that I hated
the pitifulness of my own people who had given up even resisting,
and that gloomy atmosphere, much more.

...Otherwise, I wouldn't have been able to get along so well
with the pirates, who were mostly new residents, even if they were outcasts—

And there's no way I would have bothered protecting the new residents
during a monster incident where only they were being attacked.

name: Former Pirate Boss
text:
—Yo, Hydoor.
Seems like you've been pretty active lately.
Didn't you win a gold medal the other day?

name: Hydoor
text:
...Well, yeah. I'm not the kind of guy to lose to them.
More importantly, boss, how have you been lately?

name: Former Pirate Boss
text:
Well, so-so. It's better than being told to hang myself,
so I'll take my time with it.

name: Former Pirate Boss
text:
You've changed enough to be able to team up with outsiders
you used to hate so much. We'll change slowly too.

name: Hydoor
text:
..................
That's not right, boss.
I haven't changed my mind.

—I made a decision.
To hell with destruction, no matter what...
Even if no one asks, I'll survive.

No matter how dire the situation...
I'll struggle until the very end.
The moment I stop doing that is when I 'die'.

While I'm at it. If there are other people on the verge of extinction,
I'll lend them a hand.
I'll help them survive too.

And so, I became a hero.
Therefore, I technically have a reason to save this pathetic world.

As a hero, I seem to be quite powerless to save this world.
I feel pathetic thinking that about myself.

What would the me from back then think
if he saw me being so weak-willed now?

If the me from back then,
who was full of life-affirming tenacity, were to see me...
he'd probably scold me and tell me to do something about it.

Chapter 5:
Bearer of Accumulation

Invited by the weapon craftsman, the group
proceeded deeper and deeper into a narrow alleyway surrounded by tall buildings.

At its innermost part. Opening the door of a building
that had a semi-underground structure, they arrived
at a surprisingly spacious area from the entrance.

On both walls of the open-ceilinged interior,
several kilns were installed, and around them,
steel weapons such as swords and shields.

name: Guild Member
text:
How about this!? I tried to make this
by imitating an ancient sword excavated from an eastern commune!
It's quite something, isn't it?

name: Guild Member
text:
Hey, hey. It looks the part,
but isn't the tempering a little soft?
The hamon pattern is all messed up.

name: Guild Member
text:
No... doesn't this unevenness itself make it beautiful?
If it can cut things properly,
I think it'll sell well enough.

And surrounding these weapons,
people were earnestly, yet cheerfully,
engaging in discussion.

The slightly humid brick-built space
was filled with a kind of 'liveliness'
that had not been seen anywhere else in this world.

options.text: Everyone seems to be having fun here.

name: Gnomon
text:
I heard about it from Master...
Is this the Blacksmiths' Guild?
I can't believe it still exists.

Yeah. Nowadays, you can easily make most things
if you use 'magic', right?
But here, we deliberately don't rely on that—

Each of us uses furnaces and hammers,
competing in skill, making various weapons and tools
by hand.

We appraise each other's creations,
and then it's fine to sell them around,
or put them on the market, and so on.

The rule is that in exchange for providing lodging and a workshop,
you earn your own rent and food money.
It's an interesting place, right?

name: Danzo
text:
Heh~, it's like a joint atelier for artists, isn't it...?
Is that what a 'guild' is in this world?

name: Gnomon
text:
Yes. It's said that in the past,
it was a term used for organizations
with a strong aspect of a labor union...

name: Gnomon
text:
But here, it refers to a gathering place
composed of loose connections
among people with the same hobbies.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hobbies...? Wait, isn't that weird?
You said that along with music, all sorts of entertainment
were self-regulated and disappeared, didn't you?

name: Gnomon
text:
I also said that 'some have been revived,' didn't I?
If even the concept of hobbies were lost,
humanity would surely be over.

options.text: Ah, so hobbies themselves still exist.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I see, so it's that only music and such didn't recover,
is what you're saying... By the way, Gnomon,
do you have any hobbies?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I see, so it's that only music and such didn't recover, is what you're saying...
By the way, Gnomon, do you have any hobbies?

options.text: Do you have any hobbies, Gnomon?

name: Gnomon
text:
I... I suppose it's reading.
Also, building a body strong enough to withstand rapid-fire magic
might fall within the scope of my hobbies.

name: Gnomon
text:
Thanks to that, my body has become strong enough
to be fine even if I get blown away by my own magic
or fall from the sky, just in case.

name: Hydoor
text:
...I was about to say he had a tame hobby when he said 'reading,'
but I take it back, I take it back.
What's with that smug look?

name: Danzo
text:
Hmm... maybe this guy is a muscle-brain after all....
—More importantly, even if I say so myself,
isn't it pretty tough to make a living from a hobby?

name: Danzo
text:
Even I, the ultimate creator,
have to work diligently every day to barely make ends meet.
I wonder if I can even live comfortably.

Well, yeah. I'm a newcomer to this guild and haven't been here long,
but even so, I think there's a pretty high turnover of people.

Still, the joy of forging blades outweighs the hardship of living,
that's why I'm here.
I bet everyone thinks the same.

Because I enjoy life here,
I not only sell what I make myself,
but I also take on selling my companions' stuff.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah, so that's why you came to us
carrying such a huge load...
I wondered what was going on, with all those weapons.

Well, it's a guild where blacksmiths gather,
so that's natural, isn't it?
I mainly forge weapons too.

I research by forging various blades
to create the ultimate masterpiece
that I envision.
—And that's how you guys appeared before me!

The weapon craftsman grinned, showing her jagged teeth,
and turned to face them.

I'd heard that the Hero came from beyond the 'Rainbow,'
but the weapons held by your companions
are also quite rare.

Either they didn't exist in this world originally, or they were lost...
Anyway, I really wanted to see them in person!

I perfectly understand that you're in a hurry!
But I thought if I missed this chance,
I'd never get to see them again...!

So—please!
Would you mind showing us your weapons close up!?

name: Guild Member
text:
I'm asking too!
Your weapons are super cool!
Please transform and show them to us!!

name: Guild Member
text:
It would be weird not to want to actually see and touch something like that!!
Please!

Around Barte, guild members began to gather,
one after another, all bowing their heads.

name: Gnomon
text:
...We've been completely dragged into their hobby meeting.
What should we do?
Either way, it looks like we'll be staying
in this city for another day.

name: Hydoor
text:
Huh? What do you mean?
Weren't we supposed to board the ship crossing that sea?

name: Gnomon
text:
—I just received a message. It seems the ship service
we were planning to take has been canceled
due to the monster incident earlier.

name: Gnomon
text:
It's expected to resume operation tomorrow morning.
We also investigated other routes, but waiting here for a night
turned out to be the fastest option.

name: Danzo
text:
Is it like 'slow and steady wins the race'?
Well, if that's the case, then it can't be helped.
I'll leave it to you, boss.

options.text: If we have time, should I show them?
Either way, we're stuck here, so...
How much will you charge for admission?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Hero-sama.
Charging money to people in financial distress
is bad for your image.

name: Hydoor
text:
Geez... Well, she's the one who saw through me
having trouble with my weapon.
Maybe she'll find some kind of solution.

name: Hydoor
text:
I don't mind.
[Player], transform me.

name: Danzo
text:
I'm totally okay with it too!
Well, I'll control the extent of what I show,
of course, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I'm fine. Besides, these people are only interested
in Danzo-sama's and Hydoor-sama's weapons.

Oh, you can show it to us too, you know?
It's rare to get a chance to observe a wizard's staff up close!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Please stop. Don't get interested.
If it's disassembled, it's a pain to put back together.

text:
As Danzo and Hydoor transformed,
the members of the Blacksmith's Guild became very excited.

name: Guild Member
text:
Hey, what is this!?
It's a chakram made of blades all around, and it has no handle...!?
What an unusual shape for a chakram!!

name: Danzo
text:
Non-non, this isn't a chakram, it's a shuriken!
Well, at this size,
it's pretty much handled the same way as a chakram on the hip.

name: Danzo
text:
There are all sorts of other things too, you know!?
Like small shuriken, kunai, caltrops!
And... how about a Ninja Sword!

name: Guild Members
text: Ohhhhh—!!

name: Gnomon
text:
How many bladed weapons does he have?
More importantly, where does he keep them?
Didn't he just detach a part of his body?

options.text: As expected of a ninja, they have many hidden weapons.

name: Guild Member
text:
Hey, this one's amazing too!!
A flawless form, with a subtle exotic pattern...!

name: Guild Member
text:
This anchor, it doesn't seem to have barbs,
but if so, wouldn't it slip out once it's stuck?

name: Hydoor
text:
Actually, it's better if it's easy to pull out.
Because if the target changes,
I need to retrieve it and shoot it again.

name: Guild Member
text:
Heh~, I see...!
So that's why it's shaped like this,
as if it's meant to fly well...!

name: Hydoor
text:
...Somehow, having my weapon stared at so intently,
feels strangely embarrassing...

options.text: Given the nature of Parallel Weapons, right...
Because it's a manifestation of your desires.
Maybe it feels like showing the inside of your heart.

name: Danzo
text:
There's nothing to be embarrassed about!
Let's flaunt it more, shall we!?
The customers want it, after all~, hehe!

name: Hydoor
text:
Unlike you, I'm delicate!
And why are you acting a little too happy about this!?

name: Hydoor
text:
...Besides, I'm not in the mood to be proud of this weapon right now.
I haven't been able to handle it well lately.

Hmm, I think it's a perfectly beautiful weapon, though.
Its streamlined form is designed to avoid deceleration due to air resistance.

Combined with its sturdy chain,
it's an exceptionally good weapon if used like a whip.
But from what I've seen, you use it differently, right?

name: Hydoor
text:
W-Well, yeah... I was surprised
because you suddenly started using difficult words.
This weapon of mine isn't a whip.

name: Hydoor
text:
It's meant to be shot at an opponent or across to the other side.
That's why the downside is that it's not very maneuverable...

Ah-ha, I see...
So it's not a weapon you swing around with the chain extended, then.

In other words, you need a weapon that's easy to maneuver.
In that case...

The weapon craftsman began to spread out
the contents of the basket she had been carrying earlier.

Various steel weapons and tools,
such as swords, and axes, were laid out,
presenting a sight of ample choice.

I think you should try to find a weapon that
feels comfortable in your hand from this selection!
These are all masterpieces from the guild members!

name: Hydoor
text:
Huh!? F-From these, you say!?
The weapon I use after transforming is different
from the one I use before transforming, you know!?

Huh? If it feels comfortable in your hand,
then you should just keep holding it
even after transforming, shouldn't you?

Anyway, try holding it!
This katana, for example, is my masterpiece!
Here, here!!

options.text: Oh, the merchant in her's really showing.
It's not really common knowledge, is it...

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, dear, it seems we've been played by the merchant....
Hy-kun, what will you do, will you try it?

name: Hydoor
text:
Well... normally I wouldn't bother,
but this time, I'm in a bit of a bind...

name: Hydoor
text:
Besides—surprisingly, if I try holding a different weapon,
I might find some kind of hint.
...Alright! Let's give it a try!

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey Gnomon,
come spar with me.

name: Gnomon
text:
Eh... me?
Why so sudden?

name: Danzo
text:
Yeah, yeah, exactly!!
What about my position, transforming right in front of you!?
I was totally ready to help!!

name: Hydoor
text:
Your evasion ability is too messed up to be a reference!
Gnomon is just right!

name: Hydoor
text:
Besides, it might be good practice for Gnomon
in close-quarters combat too.
There's a mutual benefit, right?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see.
If that's the case,
then I'll help you.

name: Gnomon
text:
As for me, I want to be able to react instantly
when someone gets close to me...
Hero-sama, if you could.

[Player] transformed Gnomon as requested.
He and Hydoor walked to the center of the hall.

Hydoor nonchalantly took a sword
from the weapons prepared by the weapon merchant
and took a stance.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Don't worry. Even with a normal weapon,
I can control it enough not to hurt you.
But you should defend seriously too.

name: Gnomon
text:
Of course. I have no intention of dying halfway through.
Please, come at me without hesitation.

name: Hydoor
text:
—Tch, here I come!
Hyaah!!

Hydoor swung the sword with a suppleness
that was surprising for someone holding a sword for the first time.

And Gnomon, reading the sword's trajectory, dodged,
sometimes deflecting the blade with his staff,
and landed light blows on Hydoor when he saw an opening.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Coin 1.
Fireball, shoot.

name: Hydoor
text:
Ugh...!?
—Not this one, next!!

Hydoor put down the sword and then reached for an axe.
And again, he charged at Gnomon.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Hydoor-sama.
It seems more difficult for you to handle than before.

name: Hydoor
text:
That's the last thing I wanted to hear from you...!
—Next!!

He changed weapons and slashed,
muttering 'no' and changing to another weapon—
repeating it countless times.

Eventually, Gnomon started breathing heavily,
as if he was getting tired.

name: Gnomon
text:
Hahh, hahh...
Hydoor-sama, how is it?
Will you try again...?

name: Hydoor
text:
—This will be the last one.
Among these, this one felt the most comfortable.
Gnomon, can you still go?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Of course.
I am not the kind of person
to give up at this level.

At that moment, Danzo, who had been watching
the weapon testing beside [Player],
suddenly vanished.

name: Hydoor
text:
Daaah!!
—Ryaah!!

name: Danzo
text:
—Ten-hut!!
Chop!!

Danzo, who had cut in between Hydoor and Gnomon,
deflected Hydoor's downward swing of the dagger
with a pleasing sound.

name: Gnomon
text:
What...!?
Danzo-sama!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Danzo!!
You, when did you...!

name: Danzo
text:
That was close, that was close...
That sword technique wasn't something that could be endured
for 'one more time,' was it?

name: Danzo
text:
Gnomon is already stumbling, you know?
...And when Hy-kun holds that,
his movements are eye-catching even for me.

name: Gnomon
text:
...I'm sorry,
I didn't mean to make you worry.

name: Danzo
text:
No apologies! No apologies!
More importantly, Hy-kun. That cutlass,
doesn't it fit you quite well?

name: Hydoor
text:
Ah, yeah... I'm surprised too.
Haha, what do you know...
I ended up coming back to my roots.

name: Hydoor
text:
Yeah. When I became a pirate,
the first thing the boss gave me
was a cutlass.

name: Hydoor
text:
At first, I sometimes got injured by taking direct hits
from enemy attacks... I even remember training hard all night.

name: Hydoor
text:
It brings back memories... I was a kid back then,
but I was reckless in everything I did—
Anyway, I was desperate to survive.

Hydoor narrowed his eyes,
stroking the large sword scar etched into his chest.
At that moment—

[Player]'s device flashed with a crimson light for a moment.
But...

name: Hydoor
text:
—Still, this cutlass is quite a masterpiece.
Even I, who don't usually care much about weapons,
find myself admiring it a bit.

As Hydoor's interest shifted to the sword itself,
its glow faded.
Instead, a light shone in the weapon craftsman's eyes.

Oh!? What, what, you,
you were someone who understood the beauty of weapons after all!
Ah, I'm so happy!!

I don't usually get praised like that by anyone outside the guild!
And my master never praised and encouraged me either!

Well, it's natural for that cutlass to be beautiful.
After all, I!
The future great blacksmith—

name: Barte
text: Barte-sama, forged that sword!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Eh.
Ehhhhhhhhh!!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—[Player]-sama, Danzo-sama?
What's wrong?
Could it be, a name you've heard before...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Eh.
Ehhhhhhhhh!!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Danzo-sama?
What's wrong?
Could it be, a name you've heard before...?

options.text: I feel like I've heard that somewhere...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Eh.
Ehhhhhhhhh!!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Danzo-sama?
What's wrong?
Could it be, a name you've heard before...?

name: Ganran
text:
—Well, that's how I took Barte as my apprentice,
but after a while, there was a monster incident on this planet too.

name: Ganran
text:
At that time, she went missing.
...She was swallowed by a giant path where monsters appeared.

name: Danzo
text:
Heard it before? What do you mean!?
It's the name of the person who went missing
from the location show I was MCing!!

name: Danzo
text:
Hey, you... I don't mean to pry, but
is your master's name 'Ganran'...?

name: Barte
text:
Huh? ...Eh!?
W-Why do you know that...!!?

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, seriously...?
Coincidence? Miracle? Is it a problem that can be dismissed
with such sweet words!?

name: Hydoor
text:
W-What are you talking about!?
Hey! Barte, was it!?
What in the world is happening!?

name: Barte
text:
I-I-I don't know either!!
Hey, do you know Ganran!?
Please tell me in detail!!

Leaving the chaotic hall,
they moved to the living room provided for residents within the guild.

There, they discussed and sorted out
Barte's own story and what they had heard
from Barte's master, Ganran.

name: Hydoor
text:
...What a coincidence.
Barte, too, was apparently thrown here from our world.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hey, Gnomon. Didn't you or the people at the castle know?
Didn't you greet her like you did us?

name: Gnomon
text:
I can't detect everything, you know...
Besides, when Barte-sama crossed over, the previous generation was still here.

name: Gnomon
text:
So, the welcoming of those who crossed the 'Rainbow'
was also done by the previous generation...
I wish they had handed over the information, though.

name: Gnomon
text:
However... is it possible
for the 'Rainbow' to connect to the same parallel universe
so many times?

name: Danzo
text:
That being said, the more I hear,
the more likely it seems that she came from our world...

name: Danzo
text:
All the knowledge about the world from her device,
and the circumstances of how she disappeared from our world,
everything fits perfectly.

name: Barte
text:
...I'm surprised.
Things like this really happen, huh...?
The 'Hero' who will save this world—

name: Barte
text:
I can't believe they came from the world I was in...
......

options.text: There are too few reasons to deny it.

text:
Barte still seemed unsettled,
her gaze darting everywhere,
as she tightly gripped her hands placed on her knees.

name: Barte
text:
...Hey. Was Ganran... well?
About me... did he say
anything else...?

options.text: Ganran was doing well, and also...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganran
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, when Barte returns, I'll have to take her in as my apprentice again.
So I, as a blacksmith, can't neglect my training.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganran
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even though we're far apart now, I'm sure we're connected somewhere.
When she eventually comes back, please be good friends with her.

options.text: Danzo, what did he say again?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganran
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, when Barte returns, I'll have to take her in as my apprentice again.
So I, as a blacksmith, can't neglect my training.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganran
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even though we're far apart now, I'm sure we're connected somewhere.
When she eventually comes back, please be good friends with her.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...that's what he said. Your master is doing well.

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 1]

name: Barte
text: ...I see. Then that's good. I was worried he might be disheartened.

name: Barte
text: Seriously, that was my only concern! ...I'm relieved.
Barte grinned. However, her smile seemed somewhat forced.

name: Barte
text:
...Ah, haha. Sorry, I worried you.
What's wrong, Hero-sama?

options.text: We're traveling to return to our original world.

name: Barte
text:
...!
To my original world...?
But, you guys...!

name: Gnomon
text:
...I don't mind.
It's up to Barte-sama's will.

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, an unexpected answer. I'm okay with it too!
Since boss' the one inviting,
it's like 'travelers are companions, the world is mercy', right?

name: Hydoor
text:
I don't mind either.
It's not just a thank you for showing me a good weapon,
but it's also my newborn fondness of you.

name: Barte
text:
Return to my original world...
I can return... but...

Barte, who had been so spirited just moments ago,
stammered and hesitated.

name: Barte
text:
...Sorry. Could you give me one night to think?
I want to sort things out in my head.

name: Barte
text:
I... want to see Ganran again.
But... I've grown to like this life here too.

options.text: If Barte is okay with it, then.
Come up with an answer you're happy with.

name: Barte
text:
...Yeah.
Thank you, Hero-sama.
As if relieved, Barte regained a little composure and smiled.

Not far from the guild,
[Player] and the others found lodging.
In the inn's lounge.

Without anyone calling for it,
the conversation of the four naturally turned to Barte.

name: Gnomon
text:
...It must have been tough.
She was suddenly thrown into an unfamiliar land,
and has been living here for over a year by this world's calendar.

name: Hydoor
text:
For all that, she seemed to have blended into that guild quite well.
...That's why it's a shame to part ways, I guess.

name: Hydoor
text:
But you know, I was surprised.
I thought you'd be against it if we got another traveling companion.

name: Danzo
text:
I was a bit surprised too.
Even if she wasn't against it, I thought you'd try to test her like you did us.

name: Gnomon
text:
...In your case, there was a possibility that one person
would have to protect multiple people, so I tested you.

name: Gnomon
text:
I'm not against increasing the party members themselves.
Besides... when I heard about her being separated from her master—

name: Gnomon
text:
Somehow... it felt like my chest was tightening too.
Because I also had a master.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Yes.
He was like a foster parent to me,
the previous 'Grand Wizard' who taught me magic from the ground up.

name: Gnomon
text:
He was my uncle and my master.
His situation is similar to Barte-sama's.
...My master, however, has already passed away.

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, what a coincidence.
I also had a foster parent, a ninja master,
an old man who already died.

name: Danzo
text:
As for me, if you ask if I want to see him again, it's a bit 'ehhh'...
But, Gnomon, do you feel like you want to see him again?

name: Gnomon
text:
...I don't know.
But if he were alive in another world like Barte-sama's, I would have regrets.

name: Gnomon
text:
I was wondering...
Why are you all aiming to return to your original world?

name: Hydoor
text:
Huh? Hmm... even if you ask why,
I can't give you a good answer.

name: Gnomon
text:
This might sound harsh, but...
Currently, there's no established way to return to your original world.

name: Gnomon
text:
Even though people come through the 'Rainbow',
there's no data of anyone having returned through the 'Rainbow'.

name: Gnomon
text:
If it's just about living,
it should be possible in this world,
as long as we can close the 'rift'.

name: Gnomon
text:
Is it because, like Barte-sama,
you have some kind of lingering attachment that makes you aim
to return even if it means you have to overcome difficulties?

name: Danzo
text:
Hmmmm...
Well, I can't say it's not there, or rather,
it's definitely there, that's my answer, I guess.

name: Danzo
text:
I still haven't fulfilled my duty to my current master.
In this state, I can't just say, 'I'll live in another world now~'.

name: Danzo
text:
Is this also the misfortune of being born a ninja?
Anyway, I have to go back if I could.

name: Danzo
text:
[Player]-kun, you too, right?
You want to go back because there are people
you want to see and debts you want to repay, aren't you?

options.text: Yeah, there are people I want to see again.
There are people I haven't fully repaid my debts to yet.
Because I left my beloved behind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Danzo
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Whoa~. More passionate than I thought.

name: Gnomon
text:
I see... You two have such strong bonds, don't you?
Is it the same for Hydoor-sama?

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh, me!?
No, I hadn't really thought about a reason to go back...

name: Hydoor
text:
But well... yeah.
It's a bit embarrassing to put into words, but.

name: Hydoor
text:
Even if they're annoying or irritating,
when I think about the people who care about me,
I can't just brush them off.

name: Hydoor
text:
...When I go back, there are tons of people I want to talk to.
That's why I want to go back to my original world.

name: Hydoor
text: —Well, if I'm going back, I'd like to smash this world's gloomy atmosphere first!
Saying that, Hydoor vigorously hit his fist into his palm and snorted.

name: Danzo
text:
Oh, you're fired up~.
You said it before, but you still don't like the atmosphere of this world, huh?

name: Hydoor
text:
Of course!
I'm a descendant of a family on the verge of extinction,
and I've been doing it for twenty-something years, so I have a lot to say about it!

name: Hydoor
text:
No matter how illogical it may be,
I can't stand the bunch of people who refuse to struggle desperately to live!

name: Hydoor
text:
To live is to resist!
I'll make the people of this world remember that...!
The moment Hydoor spoke of his enthusiasm—
[Player]'s device glowed red again.

name: Gnomon
text:
You casually expose your dramatic circumstances, don't you...?
Hm? Hero-sama, what's wrong?

—The next day.
[Player] and the others headed to the Blacksmith's Guild before departing.

name: Danzo
text: Now, what about Barte-chan? I wonder if she'll come with us?

name: Gnomon
text:
She was quite agitated yesterday...
I wonder if she was able to calm down and think?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Hydoor-sama.
You're quite restless yourself.
Please don't fidget.

name: Hydoor
text:
Wha—!? N-No, I'm not fidgeting at all!!
But yesterday, after being told such a thing—

name: Hydoor
text:
—Oh?
Look at that, isn't that Barte?
And...
As [Player] and the others approached the crowd, someone who noticed their presence pointed.

name: Guild Member
text:
—Ah, they're here!
It's finally time to say goodbye, Barte.

name: Guild Member
text:
You can make it wherever you go in the world!
I hope you can meet your master again!

name: Guild Member
text:
Take care!
Remember us sometimes, okay!

name: Barte
text:
...Yeah, yeah!
Thank you, everyone!
You've really helped me a lot until now!

After shaking hands with everyone,
Barte picked up the luggage she had placed on the ground.
Then, she turned towards [Player] and the others, and showed a perfectly clear smile.

name: Barte
text:
—Oh, good morning!
I'll be counting on you starting today,
nice to meet you!

options.text: Are you done with the guild?

name: Barte
text:
Ah... I thought about a lot of things after that,
but I still have so much more I want to learn from Ganran.

name: Barte
text: After all, I saw his potential and pleaded with him to take me as his apprentice!

name: Barte
text:
So... I want to see him again.
For that, I'll do anything to help with your journey.

name: Barte
text:
It's certainly lonely to leave everyone at the guild,
but this is the answer I've arrived at!

After answering, Barte passed [Player] and the others,
and walked ahead into the alley.

name: Barte
text:
—Now, let's go!
To save the world...
And return to our original world!

name: Hydoor
text: ...Hah, she made up her mind quickly. I like that type.

name: Danzo
text:
She really went for it, huh?
Even though she knows it's going to be a journey full of battles.

name: Gnomon
text:
Is this also the result of strong bonds stirring her heart?
...That's amazing.

The group exchanged glances.
Each of them softened their cheeks and followed Barte.

Waving to the cheers of the guild members behind them—
The group left the guild.

The outskirts of the city.
They approached the portwhere ferry boats
departed to the opposite shore of the inland lake.
Then—

name: Hydoor
text:
...Hm?
Isn't it unusually noisy?
Did something happen?

name: Danzo
text:
—Whoa there.
Bad omen, trouble spotted.
Look, over there.

Danzo pointed towards what seemed to be
a building for sailors.
There, there was—

name: Monsters
text:
Gigigih!!
Gipieehh!!

name: Port People
text:
Whoa, whoaaaa!!
Someone, help us!!

name: Port People
text:
My companions, my companions were eaten!
Where are the heroes!?

name: Barte
text:
Hey, hey, is it daily now!?
That's quite unusual for this city...!

name: Danzo
text:
I wish they'd let Barte-chan soak in the sentiment of farewell,
really, geez!

name: Gnomon
text:
...Naturally, we can't afford to be held up
for two days in a row. —[Player]-sama.
[Player] transformed Gnomon, and then Danzo.

name: Barte
text:
Alright, [Player]!
I'll join in too,
make me transform!

name: Barte
text:
You bet! Even in this city, where heroes are scarce,
I'm considered quite skilled!

name: Barte
text:
Come on, every second counts, right?
Just go for it!

name: Mobile Device
text:
—New path detected.
Target: Barte
Strength: Extremely strong

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Would you like to connect to the 'path'?
To begin operation, please tap "OK".
With [Player]'s approval, Barte's body was enveloped in light.

Her silhouette changed rapidly,
and numerous weapons began to appear on her back.
And then—

With her upper body exposed, and various bladed weapons,
primarily axes, on her back, Barte completed her transformation.

options.text: Is it okay to expose so much!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh? What do you mean, 'is it okay to expose so much?'
There's nothing wrong with making it easier to move, is there?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player]-sama.
What kind of expression is that?

name: Barte
text:
Alrighty then!!
Since I've been made a comrade,
I've got to show that I can really work!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Wow, full of enthusiasm!
This is going to be fun!

name: Hydoor
text:
To think Barte was a hero too... Hm?
Then why doesn't she understand the characteristics of Parallel Weapons...?

name: Hydoor
text:
—But, that doesn't matter!!
[Player], you know, right!?
That thing we saw yesterday, please do it!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, don't play dumb!
You said we might be able to observe it yesterday, didn't you!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Eh, seriously!?
Hy-kun is even showing off his new form!?
That's hot!!

name: Barte
text:
'New form'...?
What does that mean?

name: Hydoor
text:
Well, you'll see!
—Now, I'm transforming!!

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Would you like to connect to the 'path'?
To begin operation, please tap "OK".
[Player] connected the path towards the new possibility Hydoor wished for.

Hydoor's figure was enveloped in crimson light—
A wind-flapping headband, a coat.
They rapidly began to form.

—And finally. A new Parallel Weapon,
gripping a pair of cutlasses, was woven together.

Here and there, mechanical designs reminiscent of this
world's atmosphere were incorporated, but...

His braided hair and the crimson headband
tying it back truly evoked his pirate era.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Oh... ohh!
This is...!

options.text: It's a costume that really suits the pier!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, that's not what you should be focusing on, is it!?
Stop that hand motion! It's disgusting!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text: —Hah, I see. This certainly... seems like a fitting weapon for putting on a grand show.

name: Barte
text:
Oh, hey, Hydoor...!
What the, you had a weapon like that too...!?

name: Barte
text:
That's awesomely cool, isn't it!!
Hey, hey, show it to me properly later!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Hah-hah, thanks, Barte!
But that'll be after we take care of these monsters!!

name: Gnomon
text:
Following Danzo-sama, Hydoor-sama also has a new appearance...
They're changing the connection destination of their path...?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
I don't know the details either,
but that's one of [Player]'s special abilities.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Even so... Wooo!
Hy-kun, you've got a pretty cool look, haven't you!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Hah, don't think it's just about the looks!
You'll see what happens when Hydoor-sama me wields a sword,
burn it into your eyes!

name: Barte
text:
I can't be outdone either!!
I'll show you the most beautiful way to use a weapon!!
Battle Start

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Go on, step aside!!
The Hero's party is coming through, make way!!

name: Blue Bird-type Monster
text: Gigih!? Guaahh!!

name: Purple Monster
text: Gagih!? Gigigu...!!

As if dancing on the pier,
Hydoor wielded his two cutlasses freely.

Each swing of his blade precisely struck the monsters,
cleaving them in two.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Ha-ha-ha-ha!!
I haven't lost my touch yet!
I can move as smoothly as swimming!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hydoor (Travelers)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, stop imitating Hitomi!!
I just let it slide because the way she calls me is annoying, you hear!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
This isn't all I've got!
If you don't retreat, I'll push through,
to the ends of the sea, and beyond!!

name: Gnomon
text:
...He's amazing.
Just by changing weapons, his movements are completely different.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Of course!
That's the performance you were facing when you were exhausted, you know?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
This means we might be able to take it a little easier now.
—Because there's one more person.

name: Shark-type Monster
text: Gyagih!! Gigih!!

name: Barte
text:
—Whoa, that was close!
If I hadn't 'seen' it properly,
I would've taken a direct hit...!

Barte dodged the monster's attack at the last moment.
At that time, the eye-like pattern shining on her forehead moved with a glare.

name: Barte
text:
Alright... I've read most of your movements!
From here on out, I'll show off my weapons and skills properly!

Around Barte, various bladed weapons such as axes, spears,
and swords were successively generated and deployed.
And then—

name: Barte
text:
—'Eye Opening'! Eagaitzigar Schmidt!!
Here you go!!

name: Shark-type Monster
text: Gyagah!? Ga-ga-ga-ga-gah!!

Axe slashes and sword trajectories were unleashed one after another towards the monsters,
precisely cornering them in one place.

name: Barte
text:
—Now, everyone!!
Aim here!!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Tch, yes!!
Coin 3, rapid strikes!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Alrighty!!
I'll even give you another phrase as a bonus!!

Gnomon's concentrated magical barrage and Danzo's sonic control
simultaneously rained down on the monster.

name: Shark-type Monster
text: Gi, ga...! Ga-ga-ga...!

And facing the monster that began to disappear,
Hydoor leaped high—

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text: Whoaaaaaah!! This is the finishing blow!!

He delivered the final strike.
The monsters rapidly lost their forms and disappeared.

options.text: Oh, that final collaboration was magnificent!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Heh-heh, right!?
I can fight properly too, you know!

options.text: So that's how you use weapons...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barte
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, yeah, it is!?
I still have a lot more, I'll show you slowly next time!!

name: Barte
text: Ha-ha-ha!! That was a breeze! How was my performance, huh?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text: Oh, you were awesome too, Barte!!

name: Barte
text:
You too!
Seriously, from your sword to how you handled it,
everything was beautiful!!

name: Gnomon
text:
...Aren't those two getting along suddenly?
Well, I'm glad it ended safely though.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Oh my? Gnomon-kun...
Are you perhaps getting jealous?

name: Gnomon
text:
Wh...!? No, it's not like that.
I just thought it was surprising how well they get along.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Oh, come on~...
Well, I thought it was a bad omen,
but maybe the outlook is surprisingly bright.

Danzo's gaze turned towards Barte's forehead,
who was laughing with Hydoor.

options.text: Is there something about Barte that concerns you?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...No, it's nothing.
If necessary, she'll reveal the truth eventually.
I'll just wait for that time.
—That day, the ferry boat was able to operate without incident.

The boat slowly left the shore,
and swiftly advanced across the surface of the gigantic inland lake.

name: Danzo
text:
Well, well, we're finally moving!
At this rate, we'll get to the 'rift' at super express speed, right!?

name: Hydoor
text:
Oh yeah! I'm suddenly full of motivation!
I'll scatter those monster in no time!!

name: Barte
text:
Yeah!
Let's close the 'rift,'
and definitely go back together!!

options.text: Yeah, let's fulfill our mission properly!
With this group, we can definitely do it!
I hope we find a way to return to our original world!

text:
As each of them spoke with enthusiasm and excitement,
Gnomon rested his arms on the railing of the boat
and looked up at the vast blue sky.
And, as if leaking it out, he muttered softly.

name: Gnomon
text: ...Master...
